title: Revamp analytics overview widgets
description: Redesign the analytics overview section on the dashboard to improve readability. Replace old chart components with new modular widgets and sync visual styles with the updated design system.

title: Implement responsive grid for dashboard layout
description: Refactor the dashboard layout using a responsive grid system. Ensure widgets adapt cleanly on mobile and tablet breakpoints without breaking layout flow.

title: Add global loading skeletons
description: Introduce skeleton loading states for dashboard widgets. Use lightweight placeholders to decrease perceived loading time and align components with design tokens.

title: Create KPI card component
description: Develop a reusable KPI card component that displays a metric, delta indicator, and trend sparkline. Component should support theming and dynamic data inputs.

title: Integrate new analytics API
description: Connect the dashboard widgets to the updated analytics API v2. Handle authentication, request batching, and error boundaries gracefully.

title: Fix inconsistent timezone rendering
description: Resolve issues where timestamps in the activity feed display incorrectly depending on the userâ€™s locale and browser settings.

title: Overhaul theme system for dark mode
description: Upgrade the theme engine to fully support dark mode. Adjust color tokens, shadows, and chart palettes to ensure accessibility and readability.

title: Add quick-filters above analytics widgets
description: Implement date range and category quick-filters above the dashboard analytics widgets. Ensure state persists across navigation.

title: Refactor charting library wrapper
description: Clean up the internal wrapper around the charting library to reduce redundant prop transformations and improve performance.

title: Optimize dashboard bundle size
description: Identify heavy dependencies used in dashboard and replace them with lighter alternatives. Apply dynamic imports where applicable.

title: Introduce activity chart zooming
description: Add pinch and scroll zoom interactions to the activity trend chart. Respect data boundaries and animate transitions smoothly.

title: Build notification bell popover
description: Create an interactive popover containing latest notifications fetched from the event stream. Include read-state indicators.

title: Add audit trail logs
description: Display user-triggered events and system actions in a scrollable log component. Support infinite scrolling and category filters.

title: Improve dashboard first-paint performance
description: Reduce first-paint time by lowering blocking requests and preloading essential widget data. Investigate hydration bottlenecks.

title: Add empty-state illustrations
description: Design and integrate empty-state visuals for dashboard widgets when no data is available or filters return empty results.

title: Add keyboard navigation for widgets
description: Support tab and arrow key navigation through dashboard widgets. Ensure ARIA roles and focus states are correctly applied.

title: Create team-activity heatmap
description: Build a heatmap visualization showing daily team activity. Use color intensity to represent action volume across the month.

title: Implement quick-search for metrics
description: Add a command-palette style search for dashboard metrics. Allow users to jump directly to a widget or KPI by typing its name.

title: Migrate chart colors to new palette
description: Update all chart instances to use the new unified color palette. Replace deprecated color tokens and update legend styles.

title: Improve mobile gesture interactions
description: Add smooth swipe interactions for switching between dashboard views on mobile. Optimize touch-event handling to reduce jank.
